DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to determine whether Durolane is non-inferior to methylprednisolone, as assessed by level of pain, when each are given as single intra-articular injections for the relief of pain, in the treatment of symptomatic osteoarthritis of the knee at 12 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Durolane Versus Methylprednisolone in Knee Osteoarthritis
